message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.MM

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics, as well as human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves geometric and appearance constraints, which suggests the category cs.GR (Graphics). The use of a pointer for human-computer interaction suggests the category cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). The paper also involves tracking and localization, which suggests the categories cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.MM (Multimedia).
